name: Kano, Dracei of Aether
text: **Instant** - [3 resource]: Look at the top card of your deck. If it's a 'non-attack' action card, you may banish it. If you do, you may play it this turn as though it were an instant.

name: Crucible of Aetherweave
text: **Once per Turn Instant** - [resource]: The next card you play this turn with an effect that deals arcane damage, instead deals that much arcane damage plus 1.

name: Aether Flare
text:
Deal 3 arcane damage to target opposing hero.

The next card you play this turn with an effect that deals arcane damage, instead deals that much arcane damage, plus X, where X is the damage dealt by Aether Flare.

name: Voltic Bolt
text: Deal 5 arcane damage to target hero.

name: Voltic Bolt
text: Deal 4 arcane damage to target hero.

name: Voltic Bolt
text: Deal 3 arcane damage to target hero.

name: Bracers of Belief
text: **Action** - Destroy Bracers of Belief: Real the top card of your deck. If you do, the next attack action card you play this turn gets [+X attack], where X is 3 minus the pitch value of the card revealed this way. **Go again**

name: Art of War
text:
Choose 2;

* Attack action cards you control gain +1[attack] and +1[defense] this turn.
* The next attack action card you play this turn, gains **go again**.
* Until end of turn, you may defend with attack action cards from arsenal.
* You may banish an attack action card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

name: Life for a Life
text:
If Life for a Life hits, gain 1 [life].

When you play Life for a Life, if you have less [life] than your opponent, it gains **go again**.
